column4: So .. i just got my new x1950 Pro .. and i want to run it with ubuntu .. When i actiave the driver from ubuntu ( Gutsy with all updates ) And reboot my GFX begins to get hot and the cooler is spinning fast ? .. what is the problem with it ?
